revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = LinkSprite pcDuino.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/LinkSprite_pcDuino |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = LinkSprite_pcDuino |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = LinkSprite |model = pcDuino |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2016/12/29 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksprite/linksprite_pcduino1 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A10; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-400; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27UAG8T2BTR-BC; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 408MHz |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83EFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2012.10;04277-g7aa9f04-dirty; |stockos = Linux;3.4.29;Linaro 12.07;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J5 |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, GPIO, SPI, I2C |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2013 |estprice = 59 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A10 Cortex-A8 *GPU: ARM Mali400 *Memory: 1GB DDR3 @ 408MHz *Onboard Storage: 2GB NAND, TF card (max. 32GB) / MMC card slot
==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-sunxi.org/LinkSprite_pcDuino ''LinkSprite pcDuino'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/02/20/59-pcduino-allwinner-a10-board-with-arduino-compatible-headers/ ''$59 pcDuino – AllWinner A10 Board with Arduino Compatible Headers'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
